title: Left charger out of town--does any USB-C charger "work"? Any concerns?
content:
Hi,

Was out of town and left my charger.  It will be a few days before I get it back.

I found an old Nintendo plug in/charger which fits as it has a USB-C connector.  It works. It says something about 5.V and 15V.  

I also have an Apple 87W charger with a USB-C.   

Both ok to use (in the meantime).

Thank you!

Tom
